product_name: Liberty Bottleworks Seattle Bottle with Sport Top - 24 fl. oz.
long_description: Show your allegiance to the Emerald City as you quench your thirst with a sip of cool water from the Seattle water bottle with Sport Top from Liberty Bottleworks. Made in the United States from 100% recycled aluminum; all materials used are 100% BPA free. Just flip the valve up, tip the bottle and sip, or remove the cap entirely and drink straight from the bottle. Food-grade silicone O-ring in the cap limits leaks. Food-grade polyester powder coat on the inside of the bottle is BPA free. Liberty Bottleworks Seattle water bottle with Sport Top holds 24 fl. oz. Hand washing recommended.
short_description: Show your allegiance to the Emerald City as you quench your thirst with a sip of cool water from the Seattle water bottle with Sport Top from Liberty Bottleworks.
